name: Entrance Hall
description: A grand, marble-floored entrance hall. The front door is to the south.

name: Main Corridor
description: A long, echoey corridor stretching east and west. It's lined with portraits of stern-looking people.

name: Library
description: A quiet, dusty library filled with books from floor to ceiling. There's a cozy fire burning in a fireplace.

name: Study Room
description: A small, private study room. A desk covered with papers sits in the center.

name: Dining Room
description: A large dining room with a long, oak table. It looks like it hasn't been used in years.

name: Kitchen
description: A busy, bustling kitchen filled with delicious smells. Pots and pans hang from the ceiling.

name: Armory
description: A cold, metallic room filled with suits of armor and weapons. It's a bit unnerving.

name: Blacksmith
description: A hot, sooty blacksmith's forge. The fire is still burning.

name: Archery Range
description: An outdoor archery range. There's a target at the far end.

name: Guard Room
description: A small room where the castle guards probably hang out. There's a card game still in progress on the table.

name: Prison Cell
description: A dank, dark prison cell. You hope you don't end up here.

name: Secret Passage
description: A hidden, dimly-lit passage. It's cold and a bit creepy.

name: Treasure Room
description: A brightly lit room filled with piles of gold and jewels. You've found the treasure!

name: Servants' Quarters
description: A simple, cozy room where the castle's servants must have slept. It's very quiet.

name: Gardens
description: Beautiful, sprawling gardens filled with colorful flowers and chirping birds. It's very peaceful.
